  • Uses of User in com.SC2002.bto.entities

    Subclasses of User in com.SC2002.bto.entities
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Applicant
    Applicant represents a user who can apply for BTO projects.
    class 
    BTOSystemUser
    BTOSystemUser is an abstract class that extends User and implements ProjectInteractor.
    class 
    HDBManager
    HDBManager represents an HDB manager, a user who manages project listings.
    class 
    HDBOfficer
    HDBOfficer represents an HDB officer who can manage projects and process applications.
    class 
    OfficerAsApplicant
    OfficerAsApplicant is an adapter class that wraps an HDBOfficer instance and presents it as an Applicant.
